unnormalised: OMG, heard Priya got diagnosed with dengue! Scary stuff. She was saying she had a fever since 2 days ago and went to Dr. Rao at City Hospital. They did a blood test, and yeah, dengue NS1 antigen was positive. Now she's stuck at home, drinking lots of fluids and taking Paracetamol 650mg. Hope she gets better soon! Remember to use mosquito repellent, guys!
normalised: O-M-G, heard Priya got diagnosed with dengue! Scary stuff. She was saying she had a fever since two days ago and went to Doctor Rao at City Hospital. They did a blood test, and yeah, dengue N-S-one antigen was positive. Now she is stuck at home, drinking lots of fluids and taking Paracetamol six hundred and fifty milligram. Hope she gets better soon! Remember to use mosquito repellent, guys!
